compatibility.notes: CDDL-1.0 is a weak copyleft license, meaning that it allows for linking with proprietary software under certain conditions. However, it does impose some restrictions on the distribution of derivative works.

key_requirements: Comply with the terms of the license when distributing the software.
Ensure that any modifications are clearly stated.
Provide attribution to the original developers.
license.name: CDDL-1.0
obligations: Include a copy of the license with any distribution of the Covered Software.
Include a notice stating any modifications made to the original software.
Retain all copyright notices from the original software.
